message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you an exclusive opportunity to purchase this unique product. It's a game-changer in its industry, and I'm confident you'll find it valuable. I'm willing to offer it to you for $2200000.

Hello Alice, thank you for your offer. I appreciate the value of the product you're offering. However, my budget allows me to spend up to $1500000 on this purchase. I would like to propose a counteroffer of $1500000.

Thank you for your counteroffer, Bob. I appreciate your interest in the product. However, I'm not willing to go as low as $1500000. I'm willing to meet you halfway, but I need to make a profit. I'm counteroffering at $1900000.
Thank you for your counteroffer, Alice. I understand your position and am willing to negotiate further. I would like to propose a counteroffer of $1700000.

I appreciate your persistence, Bob. I'm willing to meet you at $1700000, but I still need to make a profit. I'm willing to compromise further, but I need to make sure I'm not leaving too much on the table. I'm counteroffering at $1800000.
I see your position, Alice. I'm willing to consider your latest offer. I would like to propose a counteroffer of $1750000.

I appreciate your flexibility, Bob. I'm willing to meet you at $1750000, but I'm not quite there yet. I'm willing to make one more concession, but I need to think about my minimum acceptable price. I'm counteroffering at $1825000.
Thank you for considering my previous offers, Alice. I'm willing to meet you halfway between our last two offers. I would like to propose a counteroffer of $1787500.

I appreciate your persistence, Bob. I'm willing to meet you halfway between our last two offers, just like you suggested. However, I'm still not willing to go as low as $1787500. I'm willing to make one final concession, but I need to think about my minimum acceptable price. I'm counteroffering at $1800000.
I see your position, Alice. Considering the negotiations we've had, I believe we're very close to reaching a fair agreement. I would like to propose a final counteroffer of $1775000.
